title: Senior / Research Scientist, System Level Modelling and Simulation in Electrical Powertrains

job_description:
Are you interested in system level modelling in electrical powertrains and looking for a new job opportunity in the field? Would you like to develop innovative technology with superb colleagues who are top experts in their field? Do you want to build an excellent science career and work at the interface of academy and industry? VTT might be just the place for you.

VTT is one of the leading applied research organisations in Europe. What unites us are curiosity, a passion for learning and a purpose: to solve the biggest challenges of our time and turn them into sustainable growth and well-being. We are now looking for a Senior or Research Scientist to join our Electrical powertrains and storage team!

With the establishment of a Centre of Excellence (CoE) in High-Speed Electromechanical Energy Conversion Systems (HiECSs) by the Academy of Finland, we are looking forward to increasing our teamâs resources in system-level modelling of electrical powertrains.

In this position, you will have an essential role in further developing VTTâs capabilities through the collaboration within the CoE, and through the interesting variety of jointly funded and commercial projects in the field.

Our team, Electrical powertrains and storage, works on application of electrical powertrains and energy storages in different transport applications, including on- and off-road vehicles, marine and aviation. Our team has deep excellence in data-based powertrain models and numerical design and optimisation of electrical machinery for additive manufacturing, and related technologies together with our other VTT colleagues. Read more about our research: https://www.vttresearch.com/en/ourservices/electric-vehicles-and-vehicles-systems

Please see our team's another open position: Research / Senior Scientist, Application of Batteries

Your responsibilities as a Scientist:

  • Research activities related to the CoE and other electrical powertrains and machine drives related projects
  • Taking a lead on or participating in electrical powertrain system level modelling and digital twin development
  • Being responsible of and participating in writing of high-quality scientific articles
  • Participating in project preparations, and depending on your experience, leading project preparations and projects.

Who we are looking for:

  • You have skills or knowledge in system level modelling and simulation in electrical powertrains and you can apply these skills to other areas
  • You have knowledge of different modelling and simulation tools and methods
  • You have a PhD in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering or similar related field. Master of Science (Tech.) is also possible, with an interest in continuing with doctoral studies.
  • You preferably have experience in project preparation (especially EU-projects) or experience in coordinating, managing or applying for projects.
  • In addition, experience in system-level electric vehicle or powertrain simulation is highly appreciated but not mandatory.
  • You have excellent skills in English language. Knowledge of additional languages is an asset.

As a person, we hope that you are:

A fast learner who is capable of working in a flexible and independent manner and collaborating with colleagues across different fields of science and technology. We appreciate curiosity, passion as well as the ability to take the long-term perspective and find beyond-the-obvious solutions. We hope that you have willingness to learn new things.

What we offer you:

  • Visionary work in technology. We offer positions at the cutting-edge of technology and engineering from next generation microelectronics and quantum technology to automation and robotics, energy systems and more. Our research agenda is dedicated to creating sustainable growth by solving systemic and technological challenges, so your work will go towards creating real, positive impact.   • Great career opportunities, superb colleagues. At VTT, excellence in research is a strategic priority. We offer long-term positions and stable career paths in top-level research. Collaborating in a cross-disciplinary community with superb colleagues is a source of learning, inspiration, and fun.
  • Support for your well-being. Our people are our main asset, so we take good care of them. We aim to nurture great team spirit and leadership and offer versatile well-being services to enable a good workâlife balance.
